title: Waves
description: Charley almost died in the waves last summer.Now she’s in a coma, neither dead nor alive.On returning to the beach, her younger brother Hal finds it hard to shake off her presence. Thoughts of Charley begin crowding his mind, revealing strange places and violent emotions—thoughts that Hal comes to realise are not entirely his own. As Hal digs deeper into the mystery of her accident, he discovers the truth of what happened.Veined with thrilling mystery and tinged with the super-sensory, Waves is a compelling coming-of-age story about first love and tragic loss.
author: Sharon Dogar
